name: Ballroll (Game_developer_v2)
description:
There are no clear goals in this game. You need to control the white ball thereby collecting bonuses and boosters, the higher the level, the more difficult it becomes, also at high levels enemies appear enemies can be killed either with a blaster on the right mouse button or by colliding with it, but with a small chance of collision it can kill you. 

You will learn about all the other chips by playing this wonderful game!!!
